root.pause2: Ferme cette fenêtre pour continuer à jouer.
root.how_to_play2:
Help Pegasus collect special flowers as you fly across the kingdom sky.
Press the space bar or mouse click to flap her wings.
Collect as many flowers as you can before sundown and arriving at you castle.
Good luck!
root.win2: Bien joué ! Veux-tu rejouer et ramasser encore plus de fleurs ?
root.intro_howto: Help Pegasus collect special flowers as you fly across the kingdom sky. Press the space bar or mouse click to flap her wings.Collect as many flowers as you can before sundown and arriving at the castle.
root.end: Tu es arrivé au bout du voyage.
root.end2: Il n'y a plus rien à collecter.
